author: Football Spy
title: Manchester United revive interest in Toni Kroos? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
text:
Sport Manchester United revive interest in Toni Kroos? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers The Red Devils tried to land the German, 27, four years ago when David Moyes was in charge Share Toni Kroos is back on United;'s radar (Photo: Getty) Share Get football     
Manchester United have reportedly revived their interest in Real Madrid star Toni Kroos. 
The Independent claim the Red Devils will try and land the German, 27, who they failed to sign when David Moyes was in charge at Old Trafford four years ago. 
It is believed United will move for Kroos regardless of what happens in their pursuit of Antoine Griezmann. 
Real Madrid are said to be reluctant to part with the World Cup winner, but the Red Devils look set to test their resolve.
